name: Bullet Blaze (DEMO)
description:
This is a DEMO for Bullet Blaze. Currently, it's pretty bad, but don't worry, it's still wip. For one, I have yet to add any sounds, which would probably help the game a lot...

Each time you run out of bullets and reload, you get a random gun from your arsenal. Right now, there's only one boss, Manibus. After defeating him, you get access to a chest, which, when you shoot three times, will add a random gun to your arsenal.
